description: A office file with macro is created from a commandline or a script Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Dump Office Macro Files from Commandline
query: (file.path:(*.docm OR *.dotm OR *.xlsm OR *.xltm OR *.potm OR *.pptm OR *.pptx) AND (process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe) OR process.parent.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe)))
